data.persona: My name is Joe. I'm a Trader. Pumpkins mainly. So many goddamn pumpkins.
data.description:
You are in the Secret Tunnel.
this secret tunnel is like a vein to the castle.  It leads to many other rooms within the castle.  This includes passage to the dungeon, the throne room, the kings chambers, and a secret exit to the outside.  You must be careful because the tunnel is small to maintain its secrecy.  There are 5 different rooms to the castle that can be accessed through this room. This also proves as a good escape route as enemies with large armor will not be able to fit through.
The king is here.

You are carrying a Pumpkin, wearing a shoe and a shirt, and wielding a giant club.

data.short_motivation: I want to gift the pumpkin to the king
data.mid_motivation: I hope the king enjoys my pumpkin today
data.long_motivation: I hope to become the sole supplier of pumpkins to the royal family in a few weeks
